fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Retrain yourself or another player into another town role. You may only retrain players into a role that exists in ToS1, ToS2, BToS1, or BToS2. Unless the player is Town Power, you may only retrain players into a role of their subalignment. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Townies receive a choice on whether or not they want to change into your chosen role during the day, if they accept they will convert immediately.
- Non-Townies simply receive an alert that someone tried to retrain them into your chosen role.
- You do not know if your ability fails, nor if your target accept or decline.
- If you retrain yourself, you will convert at the beginning of the day.
- Roleblock and Control Immune.
